'''''Amon Hen'' 150''' is the one-hundred-and-fiftieth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in March [[1998]].

==Contents==
* Cover: Untitled
** By: Howard J. Bates
* Editorial
** By: Andrew McMurry
* AGM and Proposed Constitutional Amendments
* Announcements
* [[Oxonmoot]] '98
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* Bywater Announcements
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Lester Simons Memorial Meal
** By: [[Jonathan Simons]]
** By: Christine Davidson
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Annie Haward
* The History of Amon Hen
** By: [[Charles Noad]]
* Letters Pages
* Artwork: ''The Faerie Lake''
** By: Howard J. Bates
* The Society Library
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Hildifons's Half of ''Amon Hen''
** By: [[Sumner Gary Hunnewell|Gary Hunnewell]]
* News from the North
** By: Lucy Ritchie
* Mathom
** By: Ian Collier & Anke Buttner
* Annie's Allsorts
** By: Annie Haward
* Tolk Folk
* New Members/Committee
